postDeccription: Custom test steps are a way to extend the standard features of Provar by writing your own logic in the form of an API and invoke it easily across all test cases.  As an example, you can create a Custom API to trigger an External ANT Task from a test case.

Custom test steps are a way to extend the standard features of Provar by writing your own logic in the form of an API and invoke it easily across all test cases.  As an example, you can create a Custom API to trigger an External ANT Task from a test case.
